submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        p = 1000000007
        n = len(nums)
        f = [[0 for j in range(nums[i] + 1)] for i in range(n)]
        g = [[0 for j in range(nums[i] + 1)] for i in range(n)]
        for j in range(nums[0] + 1):
            f[0][j] = 1
            g[0][j] = j + 1
        for i in range(1, n):
            for j in range(0, nums[i] + 1):
                t = min(j, j + nums[i - 1] - nums[i], nums[i - 1])
                if t < 0:
                    f[i][j] = 0
                else:
                    f[i][j] = g[i - 1][t]
            g[i][0] = f[i][0]
            for j in range(1, nums[i] + 1):
                g[i][j] = (g[i][j - 1] + f[i][j]) % p
            # for j in range(0, nums[i] + 1):
            #     for k in range(0, min(j, j + nums[i - 1] - nums[i], nums[i - 1]) + 1):
            #         f[i][j] = (f[i][j] + f[i - 1][k]) % p
        # print(f)
        # ans = 0
        # for j in range(0, nums[-1] + 1):
        #     ans = (ans + f[-1][j]) % p
        # return ans
        
        return g[-1][-1]
